1.content:
Jim is a graduate student in physics. He is working towards his masters and then he plans on getting a PhD. He is good friends with his professor and graduate supervisor, Dr. Donald Butler. He visits his home on occasion. One day, Jim went over to Dr. Butler's house and waited a long time before Dr. Butler finally answered the door and let him in.

"Sorry for keeping you waiting," Dr. Butler said. "I've been working on something really big."

"What is it," Jim asked. "Come down to my basement and I'll show you," Dr. Butler said.

Dr. Butler lived alone. He had been divorced and his kids had grown up and moved out. Jim went downstairs to see a big pod shaped machine. A laptop was hooked up to it.

"This is what I've been working on," Dr. Butler said. "It's essentially a teleportation device. It's not quite really yet, but I hope it will be quite soon."

Jim was amazed and just stared in awe at the machine. Dr. Butler told him he can go inside if he wanted because the machine "Doesn't work yet." Jim walked inside the pod and observed the design of the machine. Unbeknownst to both of them, there was a rat behind the machine that was messing with the machine's wires and circuitry.

All of a sudden, the pod door closed. Jim heart stopped. "Professor Butler, what's happening," he screamed. Dr. Butler tried to command the pod doors open from the laptop controlling the machine, but it was too late. He saw Jim's body fall to the ground as the doors opened. He was worried. He thought he might be dead. Upon inspection however, it seemed as if Jim were in a coma. He immediately called a hospital and had Jim's body carried to the hospital.

Unbeknownst to him at the time, Jim's consciousness had actually teleported into a different body somewhere. Who's body did Jim's consciousness land in?
1.title: The Machine

11.content: Jim regains consciousness and realizes he's in another body. Who's body did Jim's consciousness travel into?
11.title: Someone in town

choices: Jim ditches school and gets on a bus to the other side of town
111.content:
Jim slowly regained consciousness and found himself in a bed. Jim's vision was blurry for a bit and he felt dizzy. "Ow, my head hurts," he thought. "Dr. Butler's machine must've malfunctioned. I guess the affects of the machine malfunctioning knocked me out."

As Jim's vision cleared up and he could focus again, he realized that something was really wrong. He was lying is a bed with pink, flowery covers. The walls of the room were also pink and covered with posters of boy bands, disney princesses, and cute animals.

"Something wrong," Jim thought. "I better get up." As he removed the covers, he saw his new body. He was now very small, about 4'3 in height. He was also dressed in pink pajamas. "What the hell is going on!?" he thought. He jumped out of the bed and long blonde hair fell into his face. He brushed it off with his new small hand. He found a full length mirror in his new room. In it, he saw a shocked little girl. She had long blonde hair that went just past her shoulders. She had blue eyes. She was wearing pink disney princess pajamas. Jim walked toward the mirror and saw the little girl in the mirror mimic his movement perfectly.

"Oh my god," Jim thought. "This can't be happening." He stood there in shock for a while. Then he sat down on the floor and thought about the situation.

"Dr. Butler's machine did in fact teleport me somewhere," Jim thought. "However, it only teleported my consciousness, not my body. It didn't work as Dr. Butler intentioned. Does Dr. Butler know what happened to me!? Is he working on getting me back to normal!? What happened to my body!?" Jim thought about these questions for a long time before the door to his new room opened.

A woman opened the door. She resembled Jim's new form a lot. She had long blonde hair, blue eyes, and a similar face. She looked to be in her mid-30s. She was wearing a red top and a black skirt.

"Sarah, what are you doing lying on the floor?" she said. "Get up and get ready for school."

"So Sarah is this girl's name," Jim thought. "Or my name for the time being. Looks like I also have a new mother as well." Jim got up and followed the woman who was the mother of his new body. She made him waffles for breakfast. Jim tried his best to act like a little girl while thinking of a plan on how to get back to his body.

"I have to find a way to get back in contact with Dr. Butler,"Jim thought. "He's the only one who can possibly fix this, but how can I?" Jim saw some mail on the kitchen table and saw the address of the house he was in. He was on the other side of town. "At least I'm still in the same city," Jim thought. "But how can a little girl travel across an entire city by herself without an adult? There's no way I can convince this girl's parents of the truth. I can't call Dr. Butler either, he wouldn't believe it over the phone. I have to see him in person alone to prove to him that it's me in this little girl's body. But how?"

Jim thought about that as his mother got him dressed and did his hair. He wore pants with a floral design, a purple top, and some ballet flats. Then his new mother drove him to school. "Have a nice day sweetie," his new mother said as he drove off.

"I have to get across town and convince Dr. Butler I'm Jim trapped inside a little girl's body," Jim thought.

What happens next?
111.title: Back to the Third Grade

112.content:
I regained consciousness, but was vision was a bit blurry and my body a bit numb. I could see that I was standing on the beach in town a few miles away. "Holy crap," I thought, Dr. Butler's invention actually worked. It teleported me to the beach. Then my vision cleared up completely and my body wasn't numb anymore. Then everything seemed very wrong.

I could feel a strange weight on my chest and an emptiness between my legs. These were alien sensations that I had never felt before. Then I looked down and saw that I was wearing a bikini. Not only that, I was filing it out well. Then a breeze blew long blonde hair into my face. As I brushed it off, I realized it was mine. I was in a severe state of shock and confusion. I almost couldn't handle what was happening. I was almost frozen as I just looked down and observed my new body.

While still in a state of shock and confusion, another girl came up to me and said "Kate, that hot guy over there has been checking you out for a while." I looked up as she pointed to a dude across the beach. "Kate," she said, "I think he's coming this way right now. I'll leave you alone."

I stood there and watched her walk away as the dude came up to me.

http://img.barelist.com/images/hosted/tg...

"Hi", he said "I saw you from across the beach. I thought you were really pretty so I just had to talk to you. My name is John. What's your name?"

"Umm, Kate." I said in a barely audible voice. "I like that name" he said, "I'd really like to get to know you. Can I introduce you and your friends to my friends?" he asked. I saw the girl from before who I assumed was Kate's friend standing behind the dude. I was reading her lips as she was mouthing yes. She was obviously eavesdropping.

I thought about whether or not to accept the dude's invitation
112.title: A teenage girl

113.content:
I slowly regained consciousness. My vision was very blurry at first but it slowly came back into focus. As my vision came back into focus, I found myself looking at a middle aged woman with blonde hair. I was still a bit dizzy from the effects of the machine and confused by what had just happened to me, so it took me a few moments to realize that I was in a house I didn't recognize, and that I was looking at my own reflection in a bathroom mirror! The woman I was looking at was me!

http://www.hollyoaksbabes.net/_hollyoaks...

I was frozen in with shock and confusion. I couldn't move for a few minutes and I just stared at my reflection. I slowly lifted one of my arms and moved it back and forth and observed my reflection doing the same. Then I walked closer to the mirror and observed my new body. I pinched my arm to make sure I wasn't dreaming all of this. I looked down and slowly moved my new hands to the breasts that I now had. I gave them a small squeeze and felt an alien sensation I had not experienced before. I gasped a little after feeling it. Then I moved a hand down to my pants and felt another alien sensation between my legs.

"Oh my god," I said out loud. "I can't believe this is happening."

Just then a man I had never seen before came up behind me. "Hey darling," he said as he started kissing me. I was still in a state of massive shock that I didn't even resist him despite being disgusted by the idea of kissing a middle aged man.

After kissing me, he said "I know it's been rough for you ever since the kids moved out, but it's not all bad. It means we can be more intimate than we've been in a long time. We have the house all to ourselves now. I'm gonna take you out tonight. We're gonna have a good time and you'll see what I mean. I have to go to work now, but I can't wait for tonight."

He walked out the front door of the house, leaving me alone. I found the living room of the house and sat down to collect my thoughts. "Okay," I thought. "I think Dr. Butler's teleportation machine accidentally activated and teleported me into another person's body. So I guess it worked but not as he intended." I then started thinking about what happened to my body, if Dr. Butler knew what happened to me, and how things could get back to normal. All of these concerns rushed through my mind.

I decided it was best to figure out who I was and how far I had teleported first. I searched the house and found a purse in the master's bedroom that I assumed was the woman whose body I was in. I opened it and found an ID. It said this woman's name was Elizabeth Anderson and that she lived just across town.

If I'm still in town that means I can easily go back to Dr. Butler's house, tell him what happened, and maybe he can figure out a way to reverse things. I found a cell phone in the purse and tried calling Dr. Butler but he didn't answer. I also found a set of car keys. I quickly walked to the front door of the house and tried to find some shoes before I headed out. To my dismay I didn't see any flats for women and only saw shoes with heels.

"Oh my god. Does this woman not own any flats?" I asked myself. I decided I had no time to lose and picked up a pair of wedged sandals with a 4 inch heel. I put them on and tried to get used to them. I got up from the couch and started walking slowly.

http://www.hollyoaksbabes.net/_hollyoaks...

After I thought I had gotten a hang of it, I went out, got into the woman's car, and started heading over to Dr. Butler's house again. I parked the car and walked up to his door and rang the doorbell.
113.title: A middle-aged woman

123.content:
Jim regained consciousness and found himself sitting in a parked car. His vision was a bit blurry and he felt a bit dizzy. At first, Jim thought "Dr. Butler's machine must've worked. I must've been teleported into someone's car." However, as his vision cleared up and his focus got better, he realized something was wrong.

First, he noticed his hands on the stirring wheel. They were much different than before. They were dainty and petite. His nails were also manicured. "That's strange," Jim said before covering his mouth with his new dainty hands. He was shocked by his new voice. It was high and feminine. Unlike his old voice, which was low and baritone-like. He also felt long hair tickling his neck, shoulders, and upper back. He could also taste lip gloss on his lips. He also felt a big weight on his chest that he never felt before as well as an emptiness between his legs.

He looked down and saw some large breasts encased in a blue top. He was also wearing a knee length black skirt and wedge heeled sandals. He pulled down the car visor and looked in the mirror. In his reflection, he saw a beautiful redheaded girl. She looked to be around 20 years old. She had a pretty face with beautiful green eyes. She also had large breasts and a curvy body. She kinda looked like a younger Christina Hendricks. Jim stared at his new reflection in the mirror for a long time. He was in shock and awe.

Then his male mind took over and he put his hands on his new breasts, feeling sensations that he had never felt before. He squeezed them and felt a jolt go through his body. Then he moved his hand toward his crotch and cupped it. "This is so weird," he thought. Then he stopped all of sudden, feeling as if he was doing something morally wrong. "I can't do this. I can't steal a girl's body and violate her like that," Jim thought. Then he finally calmed down a bit and thought about the situation.

"Okay," Jim thought. "Dr. Butler's machine did in fact teleport me somewhere, but only my mind. It seems as though my body was left behind. My mind has to control someone else's body in order for me to teleport. Apparently my mind was teleported into the body of a beautiful redheaded girl." Jim wondered where he was and looked around. He figured out that he was in a nearly empty parking lot of a large university in another state. The sun was setting and it was almost nighttime.

"I have to get back to Dr. Butler and tell him about this," Jim thought. "Maybe he can return things back to normal. I also need to find out what happened to my body. I need to find a way to get back to Dr. Butler's house. He'll never believe me over the phone. I need to see him in person and prove that it's really me inside this body."

What happens next?
123.title: Beautiful Redhead

choices: Just pee and try to find answers to questions

As if he just woke up Jim slowly opened his eyes unaware who he was. He looks around at what is apparently a hospital and excuses himself. He found the mens restroom and walked in and went straight to the mirror. His reflection was shocked him. He was now a female in her mid 20's, long brunette hair cascading down his back. He looked only about 5' 3" and 107 lbs with pert b cup breasts on his chest. He pulled down his scrubs to find out that he was also now wearing panties. Jim pulled them to peek at the void he now possessed between his legs. Just then he heard a toilet flush. He quickly got redressed as a man walked out of the stall. The man stared at Jim and says "um, excuse me miss? This is the men's room. You don't belong in here"

Jim looked back at the man and murmered "believe me you don't know how wrong you are." But the man just stared at him in confusion so Jim said "Oh this is the men's room! How silly of me" before walking back out and realizing he did have the urge to use the restroom. "Oh great this will be fun..." Also followed by a sharp pain in his lower abdomen area. He quickly stepped into the ladies restroom and rushed into the stall.

info.brief_description: A strange machine malfunctions and sends a physics student traveling from body to body.
info.description:
Jim is a physics student. One day while visiting his professor, he comes across a machine that his professor has been working on. His professor claims that it is a teleporter. The machine accidentally activates and sends Jim on a journey through space and time. Meaning that he is forced to possess the bodies of various people around the world and throughout time.

Characters:

Jim Tyler: A 23 year old graduate student in physics who is sent on a journey possessing bodies of different people after his professor's machine is accidentally activated on him.

Dr. Donald Butler: Jim's professor and graduate supervisor who has been trying to invent a teleportation machine.

Rules: Anything goes.
